sections.title: Introduction — SAVA migration and e-commerce sites
sections.summary: Overview: the team is working on e-commerce sites and beginning to integrate services to move to the new SAVA experience.
key_actions: Identify target e-commerce sites for integration

sections.title: Adding products to the cart (demonstration)
sections.summary: Demonstration of adding products to the cart: presenter adds multiple items (paint, stain) and confirms there are two items in the cart.
key_actions: Click 'Add to cart' for paint and stain
Verify cart count shows two items

sections.title: Search results missing add-to-cart option
sections.summary: Search for a product (paint) does not display the 'Add to cart' option — identified as an issue requiring validation by the team.
key_actions: Use search field to find product
Observe missing 'Add to cart' action in search results
Log/flag the missing action for validation
ui_elements: (Missing) Add to cart button in results

sections.title: Cart to checkout behavior and missing implementation
sections.summary: In the cart, after selecting items the user can proceed to checkout, but the action that would clear the cart after checkout is not yet implemented.
key_actions: Open cart to review selected items
Note that post-checkout cart clearing is not implemented

sections.title: Action items and next steps
sections.summary: Summary of work areas: team will address the add-to-cart in search results, cart/checkout clearing behavior, and general localization/look-and-feel in the SAVA application.
key_actions: Validate missing add-to-cart in search results
Work on general locale / look-and-feel in SAVA
